comments.comments_text: Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) attempts to find some of his teammates with a dangerous pass from the edge of the box. The opponent's defence, however, intercepts the effort and clears the ball to safety. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester City will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
